extendedInfo.description: Break through language barriers with Google Translate:â¢ Translate text between more than 70 languagesâ¢ Listen to your translations spoken aloudâ¢ Directly translate speech, handwriting, and text in photosâ¢ Save your favorite translations and sync them across devicesâ¢ View dictionary results for single words or phrasesâ¢ Translate without a network connection with our offline language packages(Camera input and offline translation are available for Android 2.3 and above.)Translations between the following languages are supported:Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Maltese, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish

reviews.comment: Helps me every time to understand the english words. No problem,love this app :)  One of the most useful app !!! I\'d recommend this to everyone who are learning a new language, or you\'re out from your country!!! 5*++
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app love it <3
reviews.comment: awesome I love this app I\'m studying French and I use it to help me pronounce the word :D <3
reviews.author: Elizabeth Macias

reviews.title: Awesome........
reviews.comment: Very nice app  I m a mariner so I m traveling lots of countries and this app is helping me to understand there languages. Thank u so much for this useful app.
reviews.author: vaibhav gamare

reviews.title: Wow I\'m impressed!
reviews.comment: I was using OCR then copy/paste for the camera input but now that it\'s in there this is the only app needed! Awesome app! I only recommend that you guys work on Spanish translation and the camera OCR. Example: reads \"rn\" as \"m\" or reads \"cl\" as \"d\" or \"ln\" as \"h\" and such. Perhaps some sort of autocorrect could fix that or better OCR software. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very impressive
reviews.comment: I VERY rarely rate apps but this one deserves some attention. I have never had any problems, near perfect translations, always opens, no glitches, etc. love it!
reviews.author: Karissa Kerley

reviews.title: Outstanding apps, very helpful and pratical.
reviews.comment: Pls add synonym and antonym for the word translate, that will b more practical and convenient, no need to look for that from other dictionary to waste time, can see all from  \"google translator\" , if that happen, I will continu rate it 5 stars to appreciate the apps, THX VERY MUCH !!
reviews.author: ANNIE CHOW

reviews.title: Pretty Good.
reviews.comment: Works fine. But I\'ve an issue that on uninstalling and then reinstalling the app, it doesn\'t detect already downloaded offline language data but instead shows to download it  again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wish it was multi window app
reviews.comment: It\'s such a great app, it helps me a lot and i love it. But there is something more that i want. I\'m using Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 and sometimes when i read something and i need a translate for a word i need to close the app where im reading for and open the translate. It will be really nice if you make this app able to work like a multi window app so i will be able to use it while reading or chatting. Thanks ^^
reviews.author: Velimira Marinova

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Other then google spying and malware in all there software this app is still good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gud
reviews.comment: Needs more offline language to be installed specially GUJARATI than it wl be best application for sure :) hoping for positive response as soon as possible :*) thank you :)
reviews.author: Jaydeepsinh Jadeja

reviews.title: Need accuracy. ...
reviews.comment: Good...but need improvement..not translates such sentence/word in its actual meaning.....
reviews.author: Rajesh Parikh

reviews.title: Problem with offline language download
reviews.comment: I was trying to download offline package Spanish, download initiate n also complete but finally in translater it will say download failed.
reviews.author: manjunath santi

reviews.title: Opens the World
reviews.comment: Love this app.  Living in Europe, it makes travel sooooo much easier than it was 14yrs ago, when all we could do was memorise phrases as we needed them from Blue Planet & other travel guides.
reviews.author: Bridgette Williams

reviews.title: Program crashes when playing translated words.
reviews.comment: The program shuts down if you try to play the sound of the translated text a second time. Works ok the first time but if you press the speaker icon the second time it crashes. The same holds true for the input text
reviews.author: Joseph Hofflinger

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: nice app ,never lags . i like the idea that u can take a photo . I RECOMMEND IT TO EVERYONE WHO IS LEARNING A NEW LANGUAGE
reviews.author: Danguole Griskenaite

reviews.title: Great app but....
reviews.comment: Please fully support the Arabic language in handwriting and camera input. Thank you
reviews.author: Mohammad Khlefat

reviews.title: Legal/Fresco
reviews.comment: I m learning Portugese and spanish Special thanks for this app :) coz of it im able to translate from english to portugese /spanish and its helping me a lot in learning both the languages.
reviews.author: sirish rajan

reviews.title: WT 19i
reviews.comment: Very useful for those who learn languages, a must app to learn English through your mother tongue.
reviews.author: PRASANNA KUMAR KULUKURI

reviews.title: Great.. But!!!
reviews.comment: A lot of improvements have been made and I really like it.. But I wish I could copy translated text to the clipboard
reviews.author: Giovanni Powell

reviews.title: Perfect translation
reviews.comment: I love this, Its like my own personal japanese to english dictionary! Since there isn\'t a language learning app like \'Rosetta Stone\', that makes this app very useful to me. Watashi wa hakujindesu and I\'m still learning Japanese, so this helps. Plus i love the photo translator, no street sign will go untranslated!
reviews.author: Joe Viddard
